comment:
*

* This is a specialized adapter for creating a list of weeks with * selectable days. It can be configured to display the week number, start * the week on a given day, show a reduced number of days, or display an * arbitrary number of weeks at a time. *

methods.name: private void init()
methods.comment: * Set up the gesture detector and selected time

methods.name: public void setSelectedDay(Calendar selectedDay)
methods.comment:
* Updates the selected day and related parameters.
         *
         * @param selectedDay The time to highlight

methods.name: public View getView(int position, View convertView, ViewGroup parent)
public void setFocusMonth(int month)
methods.comment:
* Changes which month is in focus and updates the view.
         *
         * @param month The month to show as in focus [0-11]

methods.name: public boolean onTouch(View v, MotionEvent event)
private void onDateTapped(Calendar day)
methods.comment:
* Maintains the same hour/min/sec but moves the day to the tapped day.
         *
         * @param day The day that was tapped

methodNames: public View getView(int position, View convertView, ViewGroup parent)
public boolean onTouch(View v, MotionEvent event)
